createPath(pathData) → {fabric.Path}

Overriding fabric.PencilBrush.createPath Method code is exactly copy of fabric.PencilBrush.createPath, only change is creating fabric.ErasablePath instead of fabric.Path Creates fabric.ErasablePath object to add on canvas
